import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const DashboardPage = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); return (
{/* Header */}
Gallery Pavilion
Welcome, {user?.firstName}
{/* Main Content */}

Photographer Dashboard

Manage your galleries, upload photos, and share with clients

{/* Quick Stats */}
{[ { label: 'Total Galleries', value: '0', color: 'bg-blue-500' }, { label: 'Total Photos', value: '0', color: 'bg-green-500' }, { label: 'Active Shares', value: '0', color: 'bg-purple-500' }, { label: 'Total Views', value: '0', color: 'bg-orange-500' } ].map((stat, index) => (
{stat.value}

{stat.label}

{stat.value}

))}
{/* Action Cards */}

Create New Gallery

Start a new photo gallery for your clients

Upload Photos

Add new photos to your galleries

Share Gallery

Generate secure links for client access

{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

No recent activity

Create your first gallery to get started
); }; export default DashboardPage;
